mutants.original_line: filtered_ngrams = [ngram for ngram in ngrams if ngram in top_k_ngrams]
mutants.mutated_line: filtered_ngrams = [ngram for ngram in ngrams if ngram not in top_k_ngrams]
ngrams = [''.join(words[i:i + n]) for i in range(len(words) - n + 1)]
ngrams = [' '.join(words[i:i + n]) for i in range(len(words) - n - 1)]
ngrams = [' '.join(words[i:i + n]) for i in range((len(words) - n) * 1)]
ngrams = [' '.join(words[i:i - n]) for i in range(len(words) - n + 1)]
ngrams = [' '.join(words[i:i * n]) for i in range(len(words) - n + 1)]
ngrams = [' '.join(words[i:i + n]) for i in range(len(words) + n + 1)]
ngrams = [' '.join(words[i:i + n]) for i in range(len(words) * n + 1)]
ngrams = [' '.join(words[i:i + n]) for i in range(len(words) - n + 2)]
ngrams = [' '.join(words[i:i + n]) for i in range(len(words) - n + 0)]
ngrams = [' '.join(words[i:i + n]) for i in range(len(words) - n + 0)]
ngrams = [' '.join(words[i:i + n]) for i in range(len(words) - n + -1)]
